products.name: HI-VIS Reflective Jacket
products.description1: Stay protected and visible on job sites with this high-visibility, water-resistant safety jacket. Ideal for construction, roadside assistance, and industrial environments.
bullets: ANSI/ISEA 107 Class 3 compliant for maximum visibility
High-contrast fluorescent yellow with reflective striping
Water and wind resistant outer shell
Front zip closure with storm flap
Inner thermal lining for cold weather protection
Elastic cuffs and waist for secure fit
products.description2: Engineered for the toughest conditions, this safety jacket ensures visibility in low-light and high-risk environments. Designed with reflective taping and bright neon fabric, it enhances worker safety while maintaining comfort. The thermal inner lining keeps you warm during cold shifts, while the durable construction stands up to daily wear on demanding job sites.
materialCare: Outer Material: 100% Polyester with PU coating
Inner Lining: Quilted polyester thermal insulation
Machine wash cold with like colors
